overview: Co-Founder and Managing Director of iRwanda,Yan is a Social Media enthusiast and uses his skills and connections as a freelance adviser to small businesses,helping them establish their social presence and positive interaction with their customers.Prior to iRwanda,he worked for a Micro-finance institution as Chief credit agent for two years where he saw the impact of micro-credit in rural areas(Little money can make a difference) and attended the Kigali Independent University(ULK)majoring in Computer Science.Area of interest:Ethical hacking,network penetration tests and Voice over internet protocols.
